glsa.title: MyDNS: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: MyDNS contains a vulnerability that may lead to a Denial of Service attack.

background.p: MyDNS is a DNS server using a MySQL database as a backend. It is designed to allow for fast updates and small resource usage.

description.p: MyDNS contains an unspecified flaw that may allow a remote Denial of Service.

impact.p: An attacker could cause a Denial of Service by sending malformed DNS queries to the MyDNS server.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All MyDNS users should upgrade to the latest version:
